issue.title: [CF 947] Cat Druid Energy %
issue.body:
I have an icon to show my energy while in cat form using

[MP (Unit = "player")]

How can I get the energy to show as % instead of the absolute value?

E.g. At the moment it shows as 60000 which is larger than the icon. I just want it to show the % energy. The string I am using is below. TIA.

^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SSTANCE ^SName^SCat~`Form ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon2 ^STexts^T ^N1^S[MP~`(Unit~`=~`"player")] ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^Scat~`form ^SEnabled^B ^t^N62602^S~`~| ^Sicon^^
